# captcha plugin

base64 image verification captcha library for webman plugin

## 安装

```shell
composer require madong/captcha
```

## 使用

### 1、生成base64

```php
$captcha = new \madong\captcha\Captcha();
var_export($captcha->base64());  // 就这么简单
```

**以上输出base64**

```php
array (
  'key' => '6b29494e-6483-476d-a74f-3570916a0d63',
  'base64' => 'data:image/png;base64,',
)
```

### 2、验证验证码

```php
use madong\captcha\Captcha;
use support\Request;

$code = $request->get('code');
$key = $request->get('key');
if (false === madong\captcha\Captcha::check($code, $key)) {
	// 验证失败
};
// 验证通过
```
